original_text: when someone told me, ‘Saul is dead,’ and thought he was bringing good news, I seized him and put him to death in Ziklag. That was the reward I gave him for his news!
korean_text: 전에 사람이 내게 알리기를 보라 사울이 죽었다 하며 그가 좋은 소식을 전하는 줄로 생각하였어도 내가 그를 잡아 시글락에서 죽여서 그것을 그 소식을 전한 갚음으로 삼았거든

sentences.original_text: and thought he was bringing good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 좋은 소식을 가져온다고 생각했을 때

sentences.original_text: and put him to death in Ziklag
That was the reward I gave him
